pageContext.claim: “I saw last night where these radical anarchists were trying to get into the mayor's house and lots of bad things were happening to this poor, stupid, very foolish mayor. How he could be mayor I have no idea, but all he has to do is call and within 10 minutes, their problem will be over. As you know, they have to call us. They have to call and request help.”
pageContext.analysis: Kenosha Mayor John Antaramian said that Trump's comment was "completely false," saying there were no angry mobs trying to get into his house and that the “City of Kenosha remains peaceful and focused on healing our community.”
